instructions: Techtipntrick.Com March 4, 2020 at 7:21 pm Step 5: Tap on the Share Contacts button and tap AirDrop Choose the target iPhone Hit the Accept button on your target iPhone to receive the shared contacts. If you have stored your contacts in the SIM card on your old iPhone, then you can transfer contacts to your new iPhone by removing the SIM card from the old iPhone. Reply
